deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title Library to implement items that can accumulate evidence
 @author Roberto García (http://rhizomik.net/~roberto/)
@dev Modifier controlling that only registered evidence providers are allowed

@notice Get the evidence count for the manifestation with `hash`.
 @param hash Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash

@notice Adds one to the evidence count for the manifestation with `hash`.
 @param hash Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash

@title Library to implement items that can accumulate evidence
 @author Roberto García (http://rhizomik.net/~roberto/)
@dev Modifier controlling that only registered evidence providers are allowed

@notice Get the evidence count for the manifestation with `hash`.
 @param hash Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash

@notice Adds one to the evidence count for the manifestation with `hash`.
 @param hash Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash

devdoc.author: Roberto García (http://rhizomik.net/~roberto/)

params.hash: Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash

params.provider: The address of a contract providing evidence

params.hash: Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash

isUnevidenced(string).details: Used to check if the corresponding item evidence count is 0.

params.hash: Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Library to implement items that can accumulate evidence

addEvidence(string).notice: Adds one to the evidence count for the manifestation with `hash`.

addEvidenceProvider(address).notice: Adds an evidence provider `provider` contract that can then call addEvidence(...) to add evidence.

getEvidenceCount(string).notice: Get the evidence count for the manifestation with `hash`.

isUnevidenced(string).notice: Check if the evidencable `hash` has no evidence yet.
